sqlMap.statement:
select
from CONSTITUENT p
where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName#
and p.CONSTITUENT_ID not in
#ignoreIds[]#
p.$stringParams[].key$ like #stringParams[].value#
p.$nonStringParams[].key$ = #nonStringParams[].value#
and exists ( select * from PHONE ph where ph.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID
ph.$phoneParams[].key$ like #phoneParams[].value#
)
and exists ( select * from ADDRESS saddr where saddr.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID
saddr.$addressParams[].key$ like #addressParams[].value#
)
and exists ( select * from EMAIL e where e.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID
e.$emailParams[].key$ like #emailParams[].value#
)
and exists ( select * from CUSTOM_FIELD cf where cf.ENTITY_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID and cf.ENTITY_TYPE = 'person'
cf.FIELD_NAME = #customParams[].key# and cf.FIELD_VALUE like #customParams[].value#
)
